record.description: ASTP at U. of C. Observing Armistice Day. The photo shows part of the University of Chicago ASTP Unit during their observance yesterday (November 11) of Armistice Day in a special ceremony at 11 a.m. at the flagpole on the quadrangles of the University campus. In front is Major Herman E. Smith, commandant of the unit. In back of Major Smith are the following members of his staff-- (from left to right) Captain Arthur Clausen, Captain James Felts, Second Lieutenant Richard Atkinson and Second Lieutenant Alton Linne. In the background, left, is one of the buildings of the University Clinics and (right) the University Press Building.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
